description.original: Change the colors, fonts and features of Minimal Theme.
description.translation: 更改最小主题的颜色、字体和功能。

dict.name:\"Cycle between dark mode styles\": name:"在暗黑模式样式之间循环"
dict.name:\"Cycle between light mode styles\": name:"在明亮模式样式之间循环"
dict.name:\"Cycle between table width options: name:"在表格宽度选项之间循环"
dict.name:\"Cycle between image width options: name:"在图像宽度选项之间循环"
dict.name:\"Cycle between chart width options: name:"在图表宽度选项之间循环"
dict.name:\"Cycle between map width options\": name:"在地图宽度选项之间循环"
dict.name:\"Switch between light and dark mod: name:"在明亮模式和暗黑模式之间切换"
dict.name:\"Use light mode (low contrast)\": name:"使用明亮模式（低对比度）"
dict.name:\"Use light mode (high contrast)\": name:"使用明亮模式（高对比度）"
dict.name:\"Use dark mode (low contrast)\": name:"使用暗黑模式（低对比度）"
dict.name:\"Switch light color scheme to Atom: name:"将明亮配色方案切换为Atom（明亮）"

dict.name:\"Switch light color scheme to Ever: name:"将明亮配色方案切换到Everforest（明亮）"
dict.name:\"Switch light color scheme to Flex: name:"将明亮配色方案切换到Flexoki（明亮）"
dict.name:\"Switch light color scheme to macO: name:"将明亮配色方案切换到macOS（明亮）"
dict.name:\"Switch light color scheme to Sky: name:"将明亮配色方案切换到Sky（明亮）"
dict.name:\"Switch light color scheme to Nord: name:"将明亮配色方案切换到Nord（明亮）"

dict.text:\"To create a custom color scheme u: text:"要创建自定义配色方案，请使用"
dict.text:\"These options can also be defined: text:"这些选项也可以根据每个文件的基础上自定义，详情请参阅"
dict..setName(\"Text labels for primary navig: .setName("资源导航图标 📁 和 🔍 标签化")
dict..setName(\"Trim file names in sidebars\": .setName("裁剪侧边栏中过长的文件名")
dict..setDesc(\"Level of contrast between sid: .setDesc("侧边栏和主要内容之间的对比度。")
dict..setDesc(\"Navigation items in the left: .setDesc("左侧边栏顶部的资源导航图标栏改为上下标签栏的形式。")
dict..setDesc(\"The top area of the app uses: .setDesc("应用顶部窗口框使用外观设置里的主题色。")
dict..setDesc(\"Active file and menu items us: .setDesc("当前选中的文件和菜单项使用您设置的主题色。")
dict..setDesc(\"Headings use a different colo: .setDesc("每种尺寸的标题使用不同的颜色。")
dict..setDesc(\"Use ellipses to fit file name: .setDesc("使用省略号替代过长的文字部分使得文件名归于同一行上。")
dict..setDesc(\"Display divider lines between: .setDesc("显示工作区空间分隔线（如侧边栏与编辑器之间的分隔线）。")
dict..setDesc(\"Hide tab bar and status bar,: .setDesc("隐藏标签栏和状态栏，悬停可显示。此特性可以通过热键切换。")
dict..setDesc(\"Images and videos fill the wi: .setDesc("图像和视频的宽度填满整行。")
dict..setDesc(\"Turn consecutive images into: .setDesc("将连续图像转换为列\u2014以创建新行，在图像之间添加额外的换行符。")
dict..setDesc(\"Default width for table and D: .setDesc("表格数据视图块的默认宽度。")
dict..setDesc(\"Used for text in the sidebars: .setDesc("用于侧边栏和选项卡中的文本（默认值13）。")
dict..setDesc(\"Number of characters per line: .setDesc("标准行宽每行所占字符数（默认值为40）。")
.setDesc("宽元素每行所占的字符数（默认值为50）。")
dict..setDesc(\"Percentage of space inside a: .setDesc("一行文字能够填充编辑器横向空间的百分比（默认值为88）。")
dict..setDesc(\"Overrides the text font defin: .setDesc("在编辑模式下，覆盖在obsidian外观(Appearance)设置中定义的文本字体。")
